content.detailedDescription:
My wife first spotted objects in a triangle formation while parking her car. (same location as past (2) sightings several years ago). ran into our house to get husband. both went outside in street with neighbour to observe objects break triangle formation and proceed slowly east one after the other quite slowly.  each object was seperated from the following object behind it by approx. 1 mile.

the first thing we thought is, "here they are again".

all witnesses were pretty amazed but this sighting wasn't as dramatic as the feb. 27th / march 2nd, 2008 sightings that were located in the exact same airspace.

all objects departed beyond the horizon due east.
content.summary: Objects were first in a triangle form coming from ocean. broke formation and proceeded east in a straight line due east.

content.detailedDescription: It flew in from the south east looking like a clear plastic bag blowing in the wind from a distance.  as it got closer i could tell that it was shaped like a giant blood cell. clear and nearly invisible with a dark center.  it hovered above me and never made a noise.  i wanted to get a camera but i was affraid it would fly away from me.  eventually it did fly off in a north east direction.  as it flew off into the distance all i could see was the dark center of the ship.  i don't know if it makes any differnce but i was praying to god for a sign right before i saw the object.  the bible describes numerous ufo's so i wander if god really did give me a sign.
content.summary: From a distance it looked like a clear plastic bag but as it soon hovered above me it was cloaked making it nearly invisible but i could clearly see that it was a large cicle with a dark center.  shaped like a giant blood cell.

content.detailedDescription: My husband saw an object he thought was a star until he saw all kinds of colors flashing from it.  we viewed it on  meade capture view binoculars and caught some video.  i also took video with flipcam which i will upload here.  this lasted for two hours.  it ascended slowly away from us.  the object seemed part triangular and part round.  the lights werent "blinking" but flashing rapidly from inside somehow.  all colors of the spectrum.  it made us wonder if it was using the light as energy. we saw four more ascending slowly awhile later although they seemed farther away from us.  the colors flashing or spinning were red, blue, green, purple, aqua, yellow and i believe i saw orange too.  i have never seen a star like this and i looked at other stars last night which did not compare so please don't think it was a star!!  other members in my family saw it too.  we watched for hours.
content.summary: Star-like colorful object changing colors rapidly

content.detailedDescription:
For approximately one full week in november, i watched these events each night. it started as i sat on my steps to smoke, and saw a grouping of  three (3) very bright lights at a distance about a 20 degree level from the horizon. at first i thought they were landing lights on a commercial jet. however, as i watched it did not move either forward or reverse. i watched for approximately 25 - 30 min. and called my fieind out to see what she thought of it. we watched for about 10 minutes, then came inside.  
about an hour later, we heard two air force jets go over very low to the ground. i wasn't even thinking about anything with reference to the item we had seen earlier. i looked in that direction as we closed the door and saw that the lights were no longer there.

about 15 - 30 minutes later, i heard the faint sound of a jet at high speed. having spent a few years in viet nam, i rocognize the sounds of high speed aircraft. i ran to the front door, and out into the front yard. just as i looked up i saw a light go by at a very high speed. almost immeadiately, an f-16 ( i think) with afterburners burning and glowing went over. then next his wing man off to the left of his flight path and also glowing went over. as they disappeard over the trees my first thought was, what are they doing with afterburners on? i thought it was kind of a w
written rule that you couldn't light them over residential areas.

two days later i could not sleep and got out of bed at 5 a.M. i went out and sat on the steps, looked to the north, and there again were lights in the same spot. i knew it wasn't landing lights because of the time. commercial flights here don't begin until 6 a.M. i watched it until i got tired, then went inside to make coffee.
content.summary: Ufo being chased by usaf f-16's with afterburns on high

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out the patio door towards the southwest of our location, and noticed a very bright pulsating object in the sky. thinking it might be a star, i asked my husband for his cellphone, so i could bring up the star chart app. that he has, alinged it up to the sky and upon viewing the screen it showed no promient star present in the area that this object was in. i stood there watching it pulsate and noticed it was starting to move at a very slow speed, at this point i ran to get my movie camera, i filmed a few minutes of it before my camera battery went dead, but watched it till it disapeared. after it diappeared a helicopter flew over the house. upon viewing the film taken (on our big screen tv), you can see the object pulsating with some blue and it is spinning, it resembles a toy top that is spinning. with the naked eye you can not see this. very strange!
content.summary: Very bright! starlike oject stationary, moves slowly then disappears.

content.detailedDescription: We were visiting cadillac mountain for the last time before we left maine.  we took a picture on a rock and upon examination of the vacation photos for the purpose of finding pictures for a christmas card, we spotted a very small disc-like object in the sky in which no tourist saw that day
content.summary: Ufo found in family photo on cadillac mountain

content.detailedDescription: On two occasions i have seen enormous contrails in the sky, typically with contrails, are so high that they appear to be extremely small, however, in this case they were very low (about the same thickness of the moon at the time)and was across the entire visible sky. i am not an expert but if an object that was this close to the ground made a contrail as big as these were, there should have been some kind of noise. on the first night i observed two contrails that were being sweep by the wind at home during the early evening hours around 6pm-6:30pm with my wife and the second was early in the morning around 4am-4:30am while on my way to work. i am not sure if these were created by man made vehicles or what, but i was hoping i could possibly get some kind of answer one way or another, the whole thing was very weird, i hope i can get some insight on this! thanks!
content.summary: Odd large contrails...

content.detailedDescription: This past february i was with 3 friends at my house at el salido and blazing star tr. late on a saturday i went with one of my friends to his house to pick something up while my other friend stayed at my house. on our way back (going north on anderson mill rd towards fm620) my friend pointed ahead of us at a light and was in awe trying to figure out what it was. when i first saw it, it looked like a meteor or something on fire like a plane was coming down really fast towards us. but it was big and very bright almost like the moon but yellow glowing. we finally got closer as we approached anderson mill and fm620. still trying to make a normal explanation for what i was seeing, but i wasnt convincing myself of anything but a helicopter or something on fire. once we got to fm620 ready to take a right east we stopped because it was stationary and about 500 feet or so ahead of us but at a distance to where i still was having trouble figuring out what it was, i could see blue and red flashing lights as well as a yellowish orange light as if something was burning or a flame. we were at the stoplight and i looked around our stoplight was green, no one was moving (4-way light) and it seemed as if they were all focused on the strange object. i rolled down the windows and my friend and stuck our heads out the window to get a better look. i could not hear anything it was complete silence and i had a very eire feeling. still trying to comprehend the object it started to move slowly and it was directly above us and for the first time i could get a good look at what i was seeing. i was shocked and in awe as if i was watching the movie independence day when i saw a massive diamond shaped craft, that appeared to be about 7 to 10 planes wide, i cant really give a good estimate but it seemed bigger than anything i had ever seen fly. what confused me the most was that the harder i tried to look at it, it seemed to be almost see through like having some cloak or some kind of camoflage, but you could still see the shape and size, but also the clouds and stars behind it. also as we slowly turned right at the stoplight going east the object moved very slowly over us and to the south at literally like 10 to 30 miles an hour, it was moving very slow. we were going towards el salido about to take a left towards my house and i could see the object moving over the cvs nearby and the object looked very thin and it almost made no sense because of how massive the craft was. we continued on our way how as the craft continued its path south. when we first saw the craft on anderson mill rd, i had called my friend on the phone who was at my house and told him to go outside cause i thought a metor or a plane was about to crash. once he was outside i told him to look to the southwest and look just above or at the tree line, as i'm on the phone just speaking out of my mind in awe, confusion, and disbeilef, my friend spotted a airplane going south and mentioned to me he saw a plane. as i was trying to explain to him where to look he said "woah man, i just followed that plane and it just flew above a huge ball of light," (as he described) and he said it was barley above the tree line and about 5 times or so the size of the plane he saw from where he was. he continued to look at the object but he to from a distance could only see a bright light as we did from a distance. once the object went towards cvs he lost it in the tree line. looking back on the subject i was so upset with myself for not filming it because my friend next to me had an iphone which i did not think to grab as if something was not allowing me to think to film it. (my phone did not have a video or camera on it) once we got backed to my house we discussed what we saw, tried to call a couple of news stations, but they all thought we were crazy, and tried to find something that matched the description of what we saw online. my friend and i aslo sketched what we saw which was a diamond shaped craft with lights on the bottom. as we searched ufo images i came across this one that struct me in particular, because you can see right through it and besides a blue and red light where some of the yellow lights are on the top strip. it is pretty much the exact same object i saw that night.
content.summary: A huge diamond shaped craft that was silent and bright.

content.detailedDescription:
12/10/11 at aprox 1am cst seen from car driving south on camp cardinal blvd in iowa city, ia.  street was dark/not many street lights nor other cars on the road.  i was driving on an incline, so my line of sight was not only looking ahead, but up at the dark sky.  all of a sudden, out of nothing (blackness) overhead in the south-eastern sky, a row of 3 neon green lights appeared, that looked to be lined up evenly on the back of what i perceived to be something solid. when it first appeared, it seemed to be stationary, but after a split second, out of each of the 3 green lights, came a trail, yellow in color, that curved upwards, propelling the object up and out of sight within two more split seconds.  it did not cross much of the sky, but dissapeared into nothing, just as it had appeared out of nothing.  my sense was that either it was flying at "warp speed" and it just left the area too fast to register much of its departure, or it actually became invisible again, just as it must have been before the green lights had appeared. judging from how clear i could see the detail, it could not initially have been that high in the sky.  it seemed to be in the direction, from my judgement, of the ia city airport, though, though it could have been beyond the airport, and just large enough to be seen so clearly from my viewpoint.  

wanted to report this on the chance that others saw the same thing, to add to the reports credibility. if no one else reports this sighting, then it will remain a private wonder to me.
content.summary: Large hovering object in dark sky, 1st invisible, then lit with 3

content.detailedDescription:
Looooonnng story. saw that another gentleman posted a report about a triangle in nj, exactly what i saw, not the same year tho. i was searching thru archives to see if there were any other sightings the same night as mine, 10 year difference but so similar it i knew i have to report mine now as well. 

 jan 11, 1996- i had a second floor apartment in a section of manahawkin called beach haven west. it was maybe 500-800 feet from rt 72, and right before you get on the bridge to lbi. where i was in my apartment i would be overlooking the marshes to the north of rt 72. i had broken my leg badly, literally in half, in october and was in a cast from my toes to my hip. my girlfriend had left for the night, i was laying in bed watching tv. i had a long bedroom, and the window i was facing was to the north. i noticed a flicker of amber light thru that window, thought nothing of it. maybe a helicopter. continued to watch tv, every couple minutes seeing that amber light kinda go up and down slowly, light getting bigger. this went on for awhile, and i started to think maybe they were looking for something in the marsh, but didnt see any spotlights or nothing. its been out there for a good 20 minutes, 1/2 hr. now im watching the light more than the tv. it barely looks like its moving, gaining and losing a minimum amount of altitude, but enough for me to be watching it. ok, itll get closer, the house will shake, itll be a helicopter..Still watching, after a couple minutes it was getting closer and there were no green and red flying lights that i can see. at this point, even if it was a helicopter i had to see whats going on. it took a couple minutes to get out of bed and to the window, it was not easy, i was in alot of pain, and i was having complications i didnt know about till i had to go back to the doctor. i opened the window and propped myself up on the sill. 
 at this point, i knew it wasnt a helicopter, and i knew it wasnt a plane. helicopters are out here all the time, coast guard, mosquito commission, etc. i also grew up 5 minutes from jfk airport. when we were talking on the phone back home, every 4 minutes youd have to tell whoever your talking to to hold on while the planes went overhead because you couldnt hear them. i know what a plane looks like. theres also a big military presence out here, warthogs, bombers, you name it. (to mufon, the phoenix lights are flares. i stupidly stood in a cul de sac pointing up to the sky because of lights appearing in the sky and hovering there, only to have a gentleman walk up to me and show me the plane that was dropping flares, exact same effect.)
anyway, light kept getting closer and i can start to see how low it was, and how slow it was going. literally nothing more than 20-30 mph. about now it about 2-3 miles away over the marshes to the north and headed straight for me. it was getting close enough now that i saw it had more lights, the amber was the forward bottom of it, and a red and green to the other corners. much bigger than the lights on an airplane would be and steady, not flashing. now, i had to get outside. on crutches and hurting i hobbled out of the room thru the kitchen and onto my small screen deck. i wanted a clearer view than thru the screens and i had to hobble down a step or 2 outside the deck to get a wide open unobstructed view. this thing was getting closer and on a path to go directly overhead. i can start to make out a shape and it was a triangle, and it looked big. i watched it go over the marsh heading south, and watched as it crossed over rt 72 and eventually right over me. it was a huge black traingle with three lights, one on each corner,and not much of anything else. it passed literally 100-200 feet overhead, enough to know if a had a gun i could have hit it easily. ( dont worry i wouldnt have) it made no sound, silent. it was literally only moving about 30mph, a plane would be crashing into my house and a helicopter would be rearranging my dishes in the cabinets. it took about 30 seconds from when it hit rt 72 to the time it went over my house and i had a clear view the whole time. no i didnt have a camera, at the time the throw away cameras were my thing, but i didnt have one. if i did i would have the best ufo pictures to this date. i remember this event better than when i lost my virginity, got married, etc, will never as long as i live forget this. it was amazing.
content.summary: Triangle, 3 lights, moved so slow, watched for about an hour

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Higginsville, ny.  as i stepped out from under my porch, i notice directly above me two aircraft.  the first aircraft had static lights that were triangle shaped, the second aircraft was absolutely directly behind the first, and had a box-shaped array of lights.
i deliberately noted that i could see the background sky between the 2 objects.  
i then ran into the house to notify family, who came running out to the front of the house, which we then saw only 1 object (or a cluster of lights that only seemingly would look like 1 aircraft).
although i previously saw the distinction of 2 aircraft with the sky between the two, by the time we all ran out we only saw 1 cluster of lights.
what they remarked on was that there were an unusual number of solo blinking lights around the yellow'ed clusters of lights.  there had to be about 5 blinking white lights following the cluster of yellow lights.
the cluster of yellow lights and accompanying white lights continued from e to ne, at a slight inclination.
the fact that there were unusually # of single white lights following this small cluster of yellow lights as it head toward the syracuse, ny airport was indeed a fact to mention.
content.summary: Two objects, first one triangle-shaped lights, other square sharped.

content.detailedDescription: Driving with a friend in a residential/commercial area. it was out of place in the sky. probably a plane at first, until it was apparently hovering. dark triangular craft with lights at each point and one in the middle. it hovered in place and than turned abruptly and disappeared instantly.
content.summary: Black triangular craft

content.detailedDescription:
5 disc crafts played straight flight leap frog for 10 miles at high speed, observed for 10 seconds.

this observation occured on aug. 17th, 2005, at about 6:00 pm.
i was driving back home after shopping at the mall in ontario, ohio.
there were few clouds in the sky.  the sun was shining brightly.  trafiic was light.  i was taking the short cut betwwen lex-spring mill rd and st rt 97, going south east.

i stopped at the stop sign and looked for traffic, before pulling out onto rt 97 east.

lexington, ohio is a medium sized town.  the area that i was in was urban, but i was right on the s-e edge of town.  just across the road from my car was a big field, which had corn in it.
 
as i looked left into the north-east bound traffic lane, i saw a single-file formation of crafts coming stright toward my stopped position.

when i first saw them, they were coming toward me from the north east. and if they did not change course, just before i saw them, the craft passed over the far western section of mansfield. the lexington area is slightly rolling and more hilly toward the n-e horizon direction.

from where i was stopped in my car, i could see n-e approx. 5  miles at the altitude of 1000 ft. which is th ealtitude that i estimated the 5 crafts to be flying at. 

where ti was setting, there were no obstructions to my n-e or in front of me either. as i said, grain field was directly across the street from my car.

where i was stopped at this state route 97 intersection.  i was just ready to pull out onto state route 97 east bound, from this side street.

to set the stage, to visualize this encounter, i will say that:
because there are no homes or businesses between my stopped position( in my car) and the n-e horizon, i could see clearly the approaching multiple craft formation very very clearly. i did not need to get out, nor was there time for that! 

with the afternoon summer sun shining directly on the x5 crafts' near sides.   i saw them very clearly!
the crafts formation was flying toward me very very low and very fast, traveling from a n-e in a s-w direction.

the summer sun was shining on my car's rear end, as i sat with my car pointed only slightly southeast. 
and as i turned my head and looked n-e in an effort to look for on-coming traffic. there they were, right in my field of view.
 no cars were behind me, at this side street stop sign, so i did not move my stopped car, until the formation was out of sight through my right side window.  

my first impulse was to follow the ships, but they were flying very fast and very low toward the s.W.  
that was exciting enough,  but what the x5 crafts did, while they were flying toward and past me (from n-e) and also away from me (s-w), 
literally blew me away:
try to visualize x5 each round gray metallic 200 ft od sized disc-shaped craft flying very fast and very low. the craft were aprprox.  1/2 mile away horizontally, as they passed in front of my car at approx. 1000 ft altitude. 

all the time as the ships were flying forward they were also playing "leap frog" as they passed over s-e lexington, ohio.  
it was almost funny, maybe it was meant to be for our amusement?

the x5 craft were playing this leap frog (game), when i saw them approaching my position and they continued to leap frog, until i saw them fly out of sight 10 seconds later.  the x5 craft crossed my field of vision in approx. in 10 seconds.  you can do your own math on that, if you like.  i estimated their speed to be at approx. 350 mph.

to explain the leap frog maneuvers, visualize x5 f15 jet air craft flying at 350 mph, all five in a single-file line -- following each other. 
except when they leap froged each other... each one moving in turn at (what appeared to be right angles in and out of this straight line formation) - they seemed to know when it was their turn, some times a craft would leap frog over (vertically) other craft, then other craft would leap frog around (horizontally) other craft.  it looked like robotic movements and must have been computer controlled.

note: (these ships were in no way (i repeat no way) our jet craft).  
note: we can/could not build anything with that precision, not even at area 51 or at the skunk works.

think about the navy blue angels trick-flying team and multiple their skill level by a factor of  x1000.  that's how fantastic these (pilots) were.  
but they must have been young, as old people don't need to take such risks!
at any given time, as the ships approached my position and passed me by, there were no less than x1 craft simultaneously leap froging the other crafts.  and some times x2 craft were leap froging the others simultaneously, not one at a time like the navy does it. 
 
in after thought, it seems like they were thumbing their noses at us!!! they obviously did not care that they were being seen by humans.  it remained me of a air show, only much more dangerous.

note: to reach lexington from that n-e angle, the crafts had to fly right over eastern ontario,  which is just west of mansfield, ohio.

i wanted to follow the crafts in the worst way, but there was no time to get all that done and there are no fast roads that would take me s-w, from where i was stopped. i was headed the wrong direction to follow them, and i was also on the wrong side of the river -- to back track to a road that went south. it would have taken me too much time.

as i said, i was setting at a stop sign, ready to pull out onto state route 97 and drive the 15 minutes home.

if the ships would have been very high in the sky, i could have watched them for a much longer time.
my car was setting on a level spot at this stop sign, and when the crafts flew over head, i could see them clearly in the middle of my left side window and then in my wind shield, and finally in my right side window.  the crafts were no more than 1/2 mile (horizontally) away from me, when they passed over head/ in front of my car, at the altitude of approx. 1000 ft.

note:  
in mansfield, at the air national guard, we currently have c130s stationed there still. 
these big planes (during shake down check out maneuvers) fly at about the same altitude, when they make their wide turns over my house, to fly back to mansfield, ohio. 
these x5 ufo round metallic crafts were all identical to my eyes, and at that altitude the crafts must have been about 200 ft in od.  the leap frog maneuvers could have been a similar shake-down flight type of process?

the x5 crafts were flying very close to each other, and in line with each other, with no more than 200 feet max. between the x5 craft.
each crafts leap frog maneuver (for each craft)  took about 1 second max. from start to finish, so i was able to see them do their individual leap froging several times each.  
it was so fascinating to watch!  it's hard to describe it.

in the 10 seconds that i watched and saw them, at 350 mph approx., the x5 craft had time to make several leap frog passes each.
i have found only one other reference to ufos utilizing this flying leap frog maneuver. so i thought it good to share it with others.   

every new item helps to solidify a picture of these amazing craft.
the night time photos and night time sightings are okay, but they can in many cases be explained away,  and they are for the most part! but day time sightings of quality are more rare. 

if you numbered these x5 crafts 1 through 5 sequentially, i would say that craft #1 leap froged vertically over craft #3, while almost simultaneously craft #2 leap froged around craft #4 horizontally. 
and then craft # 4 leap froged over craft #5 vertically, and so on as they flew across.  it looked just like a kid's game to me!!  that was definitely not something the blue angels would have tried in their wildest dreams.
 and so this leap frog maneuvering continued like that for the full 10 seconds, that i watched them.  and because they were flying right toward me from teh n-e, i could see their leap froging clearly.  but it was more impressive to watch it as they passed in front of me. 

i did not see any cars around me during those 10 seconds.

 now to the part that drives men to watch for these elusive craft - their special xxx shape:  
don't laugh, the x5 crafts were round in the horizontal plane, being x8 wider in circumference at the very middle area, where there was a wide convex ring. above and below this middle area, the ships had elongated dooms on the top and bottom sections. the ships were of a silver metallic 
color, without lights.  the exact shape of the x5 craft were very clearly evident.

that's as good as i wish to do, without drafting you a literal drawing - which i can do, having had two quarters of drafting in college.

these x5 craft made no sounds, they had no visual appearance of a jet propulsion system. nor did they show the (jet wing-tip) vapor trails that the f15, etc.,  jets show flying low, in heavy damp air. 

i would not call them ufos, because i could and have identify them pretty well,  they were not ufos, nor were they un-identifiable!!!L  they were way to close to be ufos!!!

 i saw them very clearly with the sun behind me, with the sun shinning directly on all x5 crafts, but not so harshly that their shape was blurred.
and they passed right in front of me.

note:
i love air shows.
i have been to many air shows and i love to watch the b17(s), b29(s), b52 (s),  f14 tomcats, the f15(s) and f16(s), etc. the newer jets do their air show fly bys... right on the deck, as they say.  
these air show us military jets seem to come out of no where, because they are so low to the ground vertically and also so close to you horizontally, and they seem to appear in your vision and in a flash they are gone again. 

these  x5 round crafts were not that close to me, (as in an air show close up jet fly by), so i had much more time to watch them,  but still 10 seconds is not a long time either.  

i estimated the x5 crafts to be flying low, so that i was looking up at a 25 degree angle to my forward horizontal direction, when they were directly in front of me.  and each one was the size of my closed man-sized fist - held at 3 ft from my eyes.  if that helps to fix their size?

the mansfield air port is on the n-e side of mansfield, which is not so close, and there are no power plants nearby. many sightings appear to be
some type of search pattern.  so what are they looking for, rare mineral deposits? 

i am still an excited witness 6 yrs later.  i am a highly trained and educated man with an engineering degree and 40 yrs in engrg.

end of report. 12-09-2011
content.summary: 5 disc crafts played straight flight leap frog for 10 miles at high speed, observed for 10 seconds.

content.detailedDescription: I glanced at the sky  to the west and saw a bright object floating between clouds. it was very shiny  as the sun reflected its light off it, i viewed the ufo for about 30 seconds until the clouds obscured it.The ufo was viewed from the side (profile)and appeared cigar shaped.
content.summary: Early am, fluffy clouds with clear areas off to the west (back lighting sun). ufo floated between clouds.S

content.detailedDescription:
1.In swamp buggy sitting with three(3) others looking out over marsh area having a smoke, enjoying the evening.

2.It was a new moon night with all the stars shinning:silhouetted against star field horizon was southern boundary of an large ranch land. one could not help notice the east/west tree line of ranch lands southern border as one gazed north from an oak island across 0ne(1) kilometer of marsh sandwiched between oak island and ranch.

3.The object was over ranch land when it started to black out the star-field distinguishing said east/west tree line!

4.As i noticed the 'blacked out' star field growing: it became obvious that an very large object was emerging from horizon getting larger as it headed directly toward my crew and myself! there was no other reason to think it was anything other than an u.F.O. dominating the sky!

5. object was dark in detail as was the night, triangular in shape as it's silhouette blotted out star filled sky; traveling south by south east at approx. 3-4 knots per hr. at approx. 175ft.-250ft. in altitude!

6. my feeling reactions were cool,calm; yet mitigated by the reaction  of the others with me as they began to notice themselves! i turned to my step son as he looked and i asked,"rube what the hell is that", not saying anything immediately i asked again,"rube what the **** is that", *** **** john "i don't know"! i then turned to his uncle and friend in back seat asking "richard what the **** is that", " i don't know *** **** it"; his friend started babbling as it was obvious that he could not handle this encounter we all were witnessing! my feeling in an 'nutshell'is and always will be;    wow, lucky me, as this was not my only experience with rare events!6. as object traveled over us i did my best to make out and observe every detail i could, not paying any mind to other three(3) with me; as object continued south by south east it fading in dark night sky revealing stars in all their glory as they were before being cloaked by one huge 'freakin' unidentified flying object! that was that, but the very next day at sunday family dinner i breached the subject with step-son,brother-in-law, present in front of credible family members; both concurring with my description of events night before! i might add that they were not too talkative concerning sighting!
content.summary: Large dark object traveling over south fl. wilderness area!

content.detailedDescription: I was outside on my balcony in the sky were two orange lights i never seen anything like it in the sky, they moved very slow with no sound then about 15 mints later one orange light went out then the other light went out, i dont know where they went. in california lately we had a black out i seen the orange light again it came from the north in a flight pattern and turned east again no sound and moved slowly this time my family had seen this object i decided to tell someone because i want to let someone know what i seen i do believe this was a ufo also in the news this week someone has it on tape what they believe is a ufo im not sure but the people talked about seeing the orange lights this sounded like what i seen two times before
content.summary: Two objects hovered  2 orange lights then lights went out no sound

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside at 10:12 on saturday june 18, 2011 to feed my cat. i noticed a bright yellow light moving real slow towards me, after a few seconds another light turned on and then a few seconds another light turned on. the lights were so bright that there was a halo around each orb. the 1st orb changed from yellow to red ( it seemed to flow from yellow to red, like water sloshing from side to side slowly) and the other 2 orbs stayed yellow. the night was cloudy at about 800 to 900 foot cloud cover. these orbs are so bright that they light up the bottom of the clouds.

the orbs stopped above the house across the street from me and hovered for about 20 to 30 seconds, these orbs are about 100 feet off the ground. 

i ran about 12 feet into my house and grabbed my binoculars (10x50)and started watching them. they started to ascend and i followed them up for a few seconds and then looked ahead to see where they might be going.

that's when i saw a "mothership" at about 400 to 500 feet above me. this ship was so big that the boeing jumbo transport plane would fit inside this ship. it was just hovering with no noise. i looked back to the orbs and watched them go to the back and bottom of the ship and go into the ship. all 3 orbs went out at the same time. the orbs light up the bottom of the ship and it is still a dark color. the sky above the ship is grey cloud cover so the dark ship stands out.

the "mothership" hovered for 20 to 30 seconds, then slowly started to move to the sse. after about 15 to 20 seconds the ship just vanished instantly.
there was no fast acceleration, no vapor trail, it didn't go through the clouds, it just vanished instantly. i was standing on my front porch yelling for anyone to see this but no one was around. i looked in the house and i could see my tv cable box and it was 10:15 when it all ended

i reported it to ufosnw and william puckett checked the radar data and there was a hit at exactly the time i had reported and exactly the place i said it was.

it's hard for me to express all of the sighting in this email but i tried my best. i can convey more if it was in person.

thanks

(name moved to fi box) cms 12/09/11 19:37 cst flg
content.summary: 3 orbs came towards me, stopped above house across the street, hovered, then assend to a very large

content.detailedDescription:
This was taken around 9pm on what used to be the outskirts of san antonio.  there was cloud cover, so the sky was dark and easy to notice this object slowly dropping out of the clouds.  it seemed to have one central glowing ball and three to four smaller versions that rotated around the lower half.  i was on a hill and you can see the tree line below on the first photo.  by the time the second photo was taken, it begins to disappear into the tree cover.  no sound, very silent.  these were the only two photos i could get focus on before it was out of sight.  my apologies for the prints on the film.  note: this area is also less than two miles away from an army installation, camp bullis.

my first thought was it was a helicopter turning toward me because of the sudden, direct bright light and decent from the cloud cover.  it was in no way frightening, however it was a heart-pounding experience to say the least; seeing something you can't explain with rational thinking.  i'm hoping this post might facilitate others to comment if they were in this area in 1998.
content.summary: Glowing sphere, with several smaller glowing spheres circling it, descended and then off left.

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling/dring toward the shore on the north-south highway in new jersey, approaching the atlantic city expressway - saw a large triangle in the sky nearly overhead - it didn't appear to be moving - as i got nearly under it (though it was a little over to my left) i pulled over to see if i could identify it and take note of details - i was curious since it didn't appear to be moving and i'd never seen anything like it ie. how was it staying up there ? ........It was a triangle - large - there were 3 lights on the bottom of the craft at the corners, shining downwards - lights were constant and didn't change - i lowered my window to listen - there was no sound and the craft didn't move.......After maybe what seemed like 5 minutes i decided it was probably associated with the air force base in new jersey and i pulled back on the highway and proceeded to the shore house in ocean city - i have no idea how long it 'hovered' there after i drove away.........When i got home my husband asked me what i had been doing that i was an hour late ie. i had called him right before i left philadelphia.........So i guess i 'lost' approx an hour of time

i recently saw a couple of ufo programs on tv where picture of large triangles like the one i saw were shown and the one i saw was identical - in the 90's i began to have trouble with my muscles and eventually participated in a study at univ of rochester where my ck levels were again seen as elevated - the info i got at the time was people like 'me' were being included in study which was originally designed solely for myotonic dystrophy - i apparently have a 'new' kind of muscular dystrophy - so do others in my family........Since that time a gene has been found for some people in the study in 'my category', though no gene has been found for mine that i know of, to date.............It was the show i saw on elevated ck levels that prompted me to make this contact with the account of what i saw

the date is approx, as is the time, since i chalked it up for so long as associated with the military
content.summary: I was traveling east - saw the large triangle -as i approached i pulled over  to observe - opened window to see if noise and if i could identify as anything i'd seen before

content.detailedDescription:
I like taking pictures. i've always believed that if you take just one photo of the sky results of the photo or anything to argue with would be minimal at best. so, i've always made it a habit of taking photos in sequence. in that way enabling me to decide whether or not something belongs or doesn't belong. i took approximately 4 to 5 photos of a clear area somewhat to the left of the sun and clouds. in the very last photo there is an orb-like object. it doesn't appear to be moving- if it was, i couldn't tell. it definitely is not a glare from the sun. i also took other photos on other days, and noticed glowing lights that didn't belong. and in those sequence of photos, you can see that the object is moving. if i ran my photos from left to right in sudden sequence, you can see that the glowing light is moving. it's only obvious.
 i understand that there are people out there faking pics, but i can tell you that isn't the case with mine. you are more than welcome to look at them and study them any way you feel that is necessary.
i'm not reporting that i saw a ufo. i'm reporting exactly what i've filed my pics under- "doesn't belong". but if it doesn't belong, and it can't be explained, then i personally would have no choice but to say it was a ufo.
but i'm not the expert, that may be for you to decide. and at the same time, it doesn't take a rocket scientist to tell me what it is or isn't.
if you're interested please call me. if not, i'll just put these on "facebook" and share them with others. 
i'm 53 years old, and i definitely do not have time for games, here. if you guys are legit, or just out there treating this stuff like tabloid material, i will know based on how you respond.
i also saw what i have no choice but to assume was a satellite being maneuvered until it came to a complete stop. and to this day, that object what i think is a satellite is still there. i would like for you to confirm that for me as well, if you don't mind.
i thank you for your time.   jack menendez
content.summary: More of an orb-like object

content.detailedDescription:
Glowing object observed from window tv froze for next hr i am a seasoned investigator for the past 15 yrs 

object hovered then continued on out of my site slowly  at first thought it was a explainable event aka helicopter. but then took notice whole object glowed not just a light  and no sounds.
content.summary: Glowing object observed

content.detailedDescription: I was outside shovelling snow when i heard a weird sound. that's when i looked in the air and saw something hovering above my house. it was clearly a ufo because it was too close to be anything else. it was a coppery, golden color with flashing red lights. i felt priviledged that i was witnessing this rare event. then my dog went around front and the ufo took it up through a beam and dropped it backed down about a half hour  later. weirdly my dog was completely unharmed and shortly after the ufo left leaving a tail as it flew away.
content.summary: Ufo flew in and hovered, then took livestock and left

content.detailedDescription: This is the third time in six months that me and my fiance have noticed a strange color changing light in the sky. this time we ran inside and i got my hd vid camera and she got her nikon slr and we got some shots to share. this is something that is way brighter than everything else in the sky. this is also bigger than all the stars in the sky. the object seems to pulse different colors, blue,green,purple,white,gold,orange & red. portland is usually full of clouds but this night is a cold & clear one. this typically stays for a couple hours but i have to go to bed and get up early for work. a couple months ago when this appeared, we saw it the next morning back between the radio towers from our point of view. it has moved slowly from side to side many times. please let us know if we are just seeing a planet or maybe the space station or something? i am not very good with astronomy so maybe it's nothing, but it sure sticks out like a sore thumb, it just looks out of place. any feedback would be great, cause it's a little creepy.
content.summary: Again, 3rd time in 6 months, same location

content.detailedDescription:
I had got off the interstate to get gas in coffee co. and went the wrong way down the road i drove about a mile or 2 thinking maybe there was a gas station on down that way but i ended up turning around and heading back up toward the interstate because the town must have been on up a good ways. 

while getting lost i noticed over a field area some strange lights at first i though it was a plane but it had 3 sometimes 4 white lights on it. they would come off and on in a pattern and a couple of times went out completely. this objected looked to be hovering and descending down slowly. i have no idea what was over that way and didn't want to find out! i pulled off and watched it a couple of minutes and i rolled down the window but didn't hear a sound. i got my gas and jumped back on the interstate and headed home! i don't know what that object was but i never seen something that large not make some kind of noise and the light pattern was not like a plane or heli.
content.summary: Object with 3 or 4 white lights hovering coffee co.

content.detailedDescription: I was in albuquerque out side walking when movement in the sky caught my eye. i looked higher up in the sky at about 45 degrees at 10000 ft. it was not going up. it was going horizontal. it was a rocket with 1 tail fin. it was easily, if not more, twice the lenght of a commercial aircraft. it then started a slow right turn. thats when i saw the very long skinny wings. they reminded me of the u2 but the wings were longer and skinny. i also then saw the tail wings. it made no sound and it left no trail. as i said earlier i thought it was a rocket until i saw the wings. it had no markings and no windows.
content.summary: Very long rocket with very long, skinny wings, tail fin and tail wings

content.detailedDescription: Ne of norman near sooner road and robinson multiple lights hovering with no sound seemed to be rotating after 17 or so mins lights just pulsed and disapeared
content.summary: Hovering white lights rotating no noise

content.detailedDescription:
On the way on my wife saw what she that was a fast flying low plane until the object slowed down as it went above are car and stopped and hover right off the road,there was 6 others cars that stopped and seen it to.
the object hover for about 30 to 60 seconds and then shot off. when the object went over the car my wife last all towers on her cell phone.The object was a dark triangle with 4 bright white lights that seem to go fade in and out.For years i have told my wife we are not alone and now she knows.The object was so low that we could tell that it was not a plane or weather ballon.It was the real thing
content.summary: Dark triangle with white lights
